description: The Dual Aspect Bibs are a fully PFC-free waterproof/breathable hard shell built for alpine climbing in the harshest conditions. This combination of full storm protection for the worst possible weather, a construction designed specifically for freedom of movement in the mountains, and a materials package free of perfluorinated chemicals is an important step forward in creating highly technical products with lower impacts on the environment.
name: Patagonia Dual Aspect Bibs - Mens

specs.value: 3-layer, 3.4-oz 30-denier ECONYL® 100% recycled nylon ripstop face with a slick jersey backer, a waterproof
1.7-oz 100% polyester (87% recycled) plain weave with four-way mechanical stretch and a PFC-free DWR finish
Low-profile, bike-inspired four-way-stretch suspenders are secure and enhance comfort while wearing a harness
